title: [GAMEPLAY] Brand - does not bounce at all

embed.description: bug bug bug kha'zix bug bug

body:
when brand cast ult on a champion that is near minions the ult does not bounce. this has happened to me about 6x since the patch to "fix" brands ult.


please view link, this is not my video but this is exactly what has happened to me and obviouslyy many other players

replies.body: I felt like my damage was off... That would explain why.
yeah it will only bounce to champions if the target has ur passive on it now.  needs to be fixed.

Um, that's neither the bug or not the issue. It bounces to champions if they're ignited, bounces to minions if they're not. In this case if they're ignited (bounce to champions) but there's no champions it'll fizzle from what I can see.
Happened multiple times to me as well. Quite annoying.
When will 6.3 come out? Need this fixed asap.
I have experienced this as well.

Hey EviLTeddibr! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and we're working to get a fix in ASAP. Looks like there should be a fix in for 6.3.

This has been addressed by a Rioter and will be fixed as of 6.3
Source: https://np.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/440m7i/bugbrand_ult_bouncelack_thereof_bug_is_getting/czn8h8n?context=10000
As a Brand main I'd like this to be fixed asap. I've had this happen to me a couple of times.
Happens a lot. Now in low elo, i still get fed even when it dont bounce. But it is quite annoying that it is Bugged.
